name: 徐曉萱
objective: 本課程介紹半導體元件物理的基本概念，深入淺出介紹材料物理性質到半導體元件操作原理與應用，建立學生對半導體領域與產業發展的認識。
schedule:
1. The Crystal Structure of Solids 
2. Introduction to Quantum Mechanics 
3. Introduction to the Quantum Theory of Solids
4. The Semiconductor in Equilibrium 
5. Carrier Transport Phenomena 
6. Nonequilibrium Excess Carriers in Semiconductors 
7. The pn Junction 
8. The pn Junction Diode 
9. Metal-Semiconductor and Semiconductor Heterojunctions 
10. Fundamentals of the metal-Oxide-Semiconductor Field-Effect Transistor (MOSFET)
scorePolicy:
期中考 40%
期末考 40%
作業與出席 20%
materials: Donald A. Neamen, Semiconductor Physics and Devices: Basic Principles, 4th ed., McGraw-Hill  (東華書局)
